classes.title: Knit-A-Long Class: DaVinci Cowl
classes.description: Sound Intriguing?  Come and figure out your secret code and then see the colours pool magically before your eyes. Easy to do, just 2 classes.
classes.supplies: Materials needed - 4mm x 32in circular needle & 1 skein Sweet Georgia Tough Love Sock yarn

classes.title: Knit-A-Long Class: Diamond Kerchief Cowl
classes.description: A great cowl to tuck into your jacket on those cold mornings that are coming.If youâ€™ve wanted to learn simple lace and increases & working in the round then this is the cowl KAL for you.
classes.supplies: Materials needed - 4.5mm x 24in circular needle & 1 skein Ultra Alpaca

classes.title: Knit-A-Long Class: Thrummed Mittens
classes.description: Let's get ready for winter! Do you have a special someone that you want to keep warm? Here is an easy way to make thrummed mittens, on just 2 needles.
classes.supplies: Materials needed - 3.25mm & 4mm needles, 1 skein Berocco Vintage & Rovings

classes.title: Knit-A-Long Class: Ruby's Hat
classes.description: Here is a cute little hat for a special someone.  It incorporates short rows, and picking up stitches.  Very easy, yarn does all the colour changing for you.
classes.supplies: Materials needed - 4mm x 40cm circular needle and 1 ball of Riot
